name: ComfortGrip Ergonomic Vertical Mouse
description: Reduce wrist strain with the ComfortGrip vertical mouse. Features 6 buttons, adjustable DPI, and a smooth matte grey finish. Rechargeable via USB-C for convenience.

name: SummitFlex Merino Wool Base Layer
description: Stay comfortable in any condition. This lightweight, charcoal grey merino wool top regulates temperature and resists odor. Perfect for hiking, skiing, or everyday wear.

name: PureZone Smart WiFi Air Purifier
description: Breathe cleaner air with PureZone. This sleek white purifier features a HEPA H13 filter, app control, air quality sensor, and quiet operation for rooms up to 300 sq ft.

name: UrbanNomad Leather Messenger Bag
description: Carry your essentials in style. Crafted from distressed brown genuine leather, this bag fits a 15-inch laptop, features multiple pockets, and brass hardware.

name: Serenity Bamboo Bath Caddy Tray
description: Turn your bath into a spa experience. This extendable bamboo caddy holds your book, tablet, wine glass, and soap. Water-resistant natural finish.

name: ChargeMax Slim Power Bank (20000mAh)
description: Never run out of power on the go. High-capacity 20000mAh slim power bank in matte black with USB-A & USB-C PD ports and digital display.

name: MetroStyle Women's Waterproof Trench Coat
description: Stay chic and dry with this classic khaki trench coat. Features a double-breasted design, belted waist, and lightweight waterproof material.

name: Heritage Cast Iron Skillet (12-Inch)
description: A kitchen essential for generations. Pre-seasoned 12-inch cast iron skillet offers superior heat retention for stovetop, oven, or campfire cooking.

name: CloudComfort Memory Foam Travel Pillow
description: Travel in comfort with this ergonomic U-shaped memory foam neck pillow. Soft, washable grey velour cover and convenient travel bag included.

name: GlowSync Smart LED Strip Lights (5m)
description: Set the mood instantly. 5 meters of WiFi-enabled RGB LED strip lights with app control, voice commands, and music sync feature. Easy adhesive installation.

name: Lumberjack Essential Flannel Shirt
description: Classic comfort. Soft brushed cotton flannel shirt in a bold red and black buffalo check pattern with a relaxed fit and chest pocket.

name: AzureMist Stoneware Dinner Plates (Set of 4)
description: Elevate your table setting. Set of four 10.5-inch durable stoneware plates featuring a unique blue/grey reactive glaze. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: SnapEasy Compact Digital Camera
description: Capture memories effortlessly. This easy-to-use 20MP silver digital camera features 8x optical zoom, HD video recording, and a built-in flash.

name: Evergreen Wool Knit Beanie
description: Stay warm with this forest green unisex beanie. Made from a soft merino wool blend with a classic ribbed knit and cuff design.

name: BlendMaster Pro Immersion Blender Set
description: Versatile kitchen helper. This black handheld immersion blender set includes whisk and chopper attachments, beaker, and variable speed control.

name: AeroBuds True Wireless Earbuds
description: Experience true wireless freedom. White AeroBuds feature Bluetooth 5.2, touch controls, IPX5 water resistance, and over 20 hours playtime with the compact case.

name: Velocity Men's Running Shorts with Liner
description: Run further, faster. Lightweight navy blue shorts with quick-dry fabric, supportive liner, zippered pocket, and reflective details for visibility.

name: StoreFresh Glass Food Containers (Set of 5)
description: Durable and versatile food storage. Set of 5 borosilicate glass containers in various sizes with airtight locking lids. Oven, microwave, and dishwasher safe.

name: ScreenGuard Blue Light Blocking Glasses
description: Protect your eyes during screen time. Classic rectangular non-prescription glasses with clear blue light blocking lenses and a lightweight black frame.

name: BodyComp Smart Body Weight Scale
description: Track your health metrics intelligently. This white smart scale measures weight, BMI, body fat, and more, syncing data via Bluetooth to your phone.

name: CloudSoft Women's Cashmere Crew Neck Sweater
description: Indulge in luxury. This light grey heather sweater is crafted from 100% pure cashmere for unparalleled softness. Features a classic fit with ribbed trim.

name: CozyCalm Weighted Blanket (15 lbs)
description: Enhance relaxation and sleep quality. Queen-size 15 lb weighted blanket with glass bead filling and a soft, dark grey microfiber cover.

name: CarryAll Canvas Tote Bag with Zipper
description: Durable and practical. Heavy-duty natural canvas tote with navy blue accents, zippered top closure, and an interior pocket for organization.

name: PocketView Portable Mini Projector
description: Movie night anywhere! Compact white mini projector supports 1080p input, has HDMI/USB connections, and a built-in speaker. Ideal for dark rooms.

name: TidalWave Men's Quick-Dry Swim Trunks
description: Hit the beach in style. Above-the-knee swim trunks featuring quick-dry fabric, mesh liner, drawstring waist, and a vibrant green/blue tropical leaf pattern.

name: ChefPro Silicone Kitchen Utensil Set (10-Piece)
description: Equip your kitchen with this versatile 10-piece set. Heat-resistant grey silicone heads with durable wooden handles. Includes spatulas, spoons, whisk, and more.

name: WarmTouch Touchscreen Winter Gloves
description: Keep hands warm without losing connectivity. Black unisex gloves with conductive fingertips, thermal lining, and a windproof outer shell.

name: MechStrike RGB Gaming Keyboard
description: Dominate the game with this black mechanical keyboard. Features tactile blue switches, customizable RGB backlighting, and a full-size layout.

name: HydroFlow Insulated Steel Water Bottle (32 oz)
description: Stay hydrated all day. 32 oz vacuum-insulated bottle in matte teal keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12. Leak-proof straw lid included.

name: Heritage Men's Classic Leather Belt
description: A timeless accessory. This dark brown belt is crafted from 1.5-inch wide full-grain genuine leather with a classic silver-tone buckle.
